name: ROECY' PURE CHOCOLATE “SWEET & MILK”
info: This selection has a mix of semi-sweet and classic milk chocolates. 55% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Sweet”) and 43% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Milk”).

name: ROECY' PURE CHOCOLATE “CARAMEL MILK”
info: This selection has a mix of milk and white chocolates. 42% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Caramel Milk”) and 37% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Creamy White”).

name: ROECY' PURE CHOCOLATE “MACCHA MILK”
info: This selection has a mix of milk and maccha chocolates. 42% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Caramel Milk”) and 37% Maccha (Pure Chocolate “Maccha”).

name: ROECY' CRUNCH CHOCOLATE
info: This selection has a crunch chocolates. 80% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Mild Bitter”).

name: ROECY' HEART CHOCOLATE
info: This selection has a mix of milk and white chocolates. 42% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Caramel Milk”) and 37% Cacao (Pure Chocolate “Creamy White”).

name: ROECY' CHOCOLATE WAFERS “HAZEL CREAM”
info: This selection features delicately sweet hazelnut cream sandwiched between crispy wafers and coated with milk chocolate. 12 pieces inside.

name: ROECY' CHOCOLATE WAFERS “STRAWBERRY CREAM”
info: This selection has chocolate-coated crispy wafers filled with strawberry cream. 12 pieces inside.

name: ROECY' CHOCOLATE WAFERS “MACCHA”
info: This selection has Matcha cream sandwiched between crispy wafers and coated with white chocolate infused with Maccha. 12 pieces inside.

name: ROECY' CHOCOLATE WAFERS “CHERRY CREAM”
info: This selection has chocolate-coated crispy wafers filled with cherry cream. 12 pieces inside.

name: ROECY' CHOCOLATE WAFERS ROLL
info: This selection features delicately sweet hazelnut cream sandwiched between crispy wafers and coated with milk chocolate. 16 pieces inside.
